name: Buildres
description:
Buildres

is a game were you build missing parts of buildings with your friends...

You have to create concrete, build the cube with wood, fill the cubes with concrete and lastly vibrate the concrete.

You may also have to use scaffolds to support the cubes or to allow you to get higher.

Controlls. JOYPAD

(in XBOX Gamepad keys)

Left Stick for movement and aiming.

X - for using, grabbing and throwing objects. For grab or use tap the button. To throw an object you have to keep the button pressed and release it as soon you reach the power you want to throw the object.

A - for jumping. You cannot jump while you hold an object, if you do so, you will release the object you are holding.

B - For running. You can run only if you do not hold an object, If you hold one nothing will happen.

Y - for switching players in 1 player game.

D-Pad - for changing clothes and skin color.

KEYBOARD

K - to toggle the first player to use keyboard or joypad.

Directional Buttons for movement and aim.

Z - grab, use and throw.

X - Jump.

C - Run.

S - Change character.

E,D - Change skin color

Q,A - Change Clothes Colors

DROP IN DROP OUT

Players can drop in and out of the game when you are in stage select (in the Van) by pressing the Start button on their Joypad.

ADVANCEMENT

You have to finish at least 4 stages in a town to unlock the next town.

IN GAME TUTORIAL
 GAMEPLAY VIDEOS MADE WITH GODOT ENGINE
